GSP31tattvmiu:1_0: sukhaikaviṣayā bhūtānāṃ pravṛttiḥ / sukhaṃ ca sati duḥkhahetāvasambhavati / ato bhavati
GSP31tattvmiu:1_1: duḥkhābhighātake jijñāsā sā ca tattvajñānāt / atastattvamatra nirūpyate / nanu trividhaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:1_2: duḥkham ādhyātmikamādhidaivikamādhibhautikaṃ ca / tatrādhyātmikaṃ dvividhaṃ śārīraṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:1_3: mānasañca / śārīraṃ vātapittaśleṣmaṇāṃ vaiṣamyanimittaṃ mānasaṃ kāmakrodhādinibandhanam /
GSP31tattvmiu:1_5: teṣāṃ caiṣāṃ laukikairevopāyaiḥ pratīkāraḥ śakyate / tathā hi śārīrasyauṣadhādibhiḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:1_7: ādhidaivikasya maṇimantrādyupayogeneti sukara upāyaḥ tattvajñānaṃ tvanekajanmaraparābhyāsasādhyam /
GSP31tattvmiu:2: akke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet /
GSP31tattvmiu:3: iṣṭasyārthasya saṃprāptau ko vidvān yatnamācaret // iti /
GSP31tattvmiu:4_0: akke gṛhakoṇe / maivam / na hyetairupāyaiḥ sarvameva duḥkhaṃ nivartate / nivṛttaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:4_2: śrūyate apāma somamamṛtā abhūmeti tathāpi etadapi laukikopāyatulyameva / tathāhi
GSP31tattvmiu:4_3: somayāgaḥ paśuvadhādisādhanatvānna viśeṣataḥ śuddhaḥ / akṛte hi tadvadhaprāyaścitte
GSP31tattvmiu:4_4: svargādigatyanantaraṃ paripacyate eva tadduḥkham / na ca na hiṃsyātsarvābhūtānīti
GSP31tattvmiu:4_5: sāmānyaśāstrabhya viśeṣaśāstreṇāgnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhetetyanena bādhaḥ śaṅkyaḥ bhinnaviṣayatvena
GSP31tattvmiu:4_6: bādhyabādhakabhāvāsambhavāt agnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabheteti vākyena hi vadhasya kratūpakārakatvameva
GSP31tattvmiu:4_7: bodhyate na tu puruṣapratyavāyābhāvaḥ / evaṃ svargāderanityatvamapi sattve sati kāryatvādanumīyate / tathā ca śrutirapi
GSP31tattvmiu:5: na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaikenāmṛtatvamānaśuḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:6: pareṇa nākaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ vibhrājate yadyatayo viśanti //
GSP31tattvmiu:7_0: karmaṇā jyotiṣṭomādinā prajayā putreṇa dhanena devatājñānena putreṇāyaṃ loko jeyo
GSP31tattvmiu:7_1: vidyayā devalokaḥ karmaṇā pitṛloka iti śrutyantarāt ebhiḥ pitrādilokasyaiva prāptirnāmṛtatvasyeti
GSP31tattvmiu:7_2: bhāvaha / tarhi kathamamṛtatvamityata āha tyāgeneti / sarvakarmasaṃnyāsasādhyajñānenetyarthaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:7_3: tadamṛtatvaṃ svarga eva cettattrāha pareṇa nākamiti / tarhi dūrasthatvānna prāpyamiti
GSP31tattvmiu:7_4: cettatrāha nihitaṃ guhāyāmiti / taccāsannatvātpṛthak janairapi labhyamiti cettatrāha
GSP31tattvmiu:7_5: yadyataya iti / adūrabhūtamapyavivekināṃ dūrabhūtameva / tathā śrutyantaram /
GSP31tattvmiu:9: tathā 'pare ṛṣayo ye manīṣiṇaḥ paraṃ karmabhyo 'mṛtatvamānaśuriti //
GSP31tattvmiu:10_0: apāma somamamṛtā abhūmetyamṛtatvābhidhānaṃ tu cirasthityabhiprāyam / yadāhuḥ ābhūtasamplavaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:10_1: sthānamamṛtatvaṃ hi bhāṣyate iti / tadetatsarvamabhipretyoktaṃ śāstrakṛdbhiḥ tadbiparītaḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:10_3: hiṃsādyasaṅkarādviśuddha upāyaḥ śreyān / sa ca katham ?
GSP31tattvmiu:11_0: vyaktasya kāryajātasya tatkāraṇasya avyaktasya pradhānasya tābhyāṃ parasya tasyātmanaśca
GSP31tattvmiu:11_1: vivekena jñānādbhavati iti / na ca vivekotpannaphalasyāpi kāryatvādanityatvaṃ śaṃkyam /
GSP31tattvmiu:12_0: athātra śāstre catasro vidhāḥ / prakṛtirvikṛtirubhayamanubhayañceti / tatra jagato
GSP31tattvmiu:12_1: mūlakāraṇabhūtaṃ pradhānaṃ na vikāraḥ kintu prakṛtireva prakarotīti prakṛtiḥ sattvarajastamasāṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:12_3: śāstrāntare avidyā māyāśabdenocyate / etadevāvyaktaṃ sattvādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ vaiṣamye
GSP31tattvmiu:12_4: sati vyaktamityucyate / yathāhi samudrajale calitācalitapradeśāḥ / evaṃ triguṇātmike
GSP31tattvmiu:12_5: pradhāne pariṇāmavāṃstadvidhuraśca pradeśaḥ / tatra prakṛtivikāreṣu madhye ādyo vikāro
GSP31tattvmiu:12_6: mahānityucyate sa etadbuddhilakṣaṇaḥ / sa āha mahānsāttviko rājasastāmasaśceti trividhaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:12_7: buddhestu prathamo vikāro 'haṅkāraḥ / ete ca mahadādayaḥ prakṛtayo vikṛtayaśca /
GSP31tattvmiu:12_8: tathāhi mahattattvamahaṅkārasya prakṛtirvikṛtiśca mūlaprakṛteḥ / ayaṃ hi kramaḥ prakṛtermahān
GSP31tattvmiu:12_9: mahato 'haṅkāraṃ ahaṅkārātpañca tanmātrāḥ tābhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni tanmātrāṇi punaḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:12_11: guṇavaiṣamyameva tanmātraśabdena bhūtaśabdena cocyate / pañca bhūtāni ekādaśendriyāṇi
GSP31tattvmiu:12_12: ceti eṣa ṣoḍaśako gaṇastu vikāra eva na prakṛtiḥ / puruṣastvātmā na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ / tadetadāhuḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:14: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ // iti /
GSP31tattvmiu:15_0: atha śāstraparibhāṣā / dṛṣṭamanumānamāptavacanañceti trividhaṃ laukikaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP31tattvmiu:15_1: ārṣaṃ tu vijñānaṃ yogināmeveti tadatra noktam / tatra pṛthivyādayaḥ sukhādayaścāsmadādīnāṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:15_2: viṣayāḥ / tanmātralakṣaṇāstu devānāṃ yogināṃ ca viṣayā na tvasmadādīnām teṣāṃ cendriyaiḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:15_3: sambandhaḥ sannikarṣaḥ / evañca viṣayasambaddhendriyāśrito yo buddhidharmo 'dhyavasāyaḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:15_4: sa eva pramāṇam / ayaṃ hi kramaḥ / viṣayasambaddhānāmindriyāṇāṃ vṛttau satyāṃ buddhestu
GSP31tattvmiu:15_5: tamobhibhave sati yaḥ sattvasamudrekaḥ so 'dhyavasāya iti jñānamiti vṛttiścākhyāyate /
GSP31tattvmiu:15_6: tadidaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇam / asmācca yaścetanāśakteranugrahastatphalaṃ pramā bodhaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:15_8: evaṃ hi buddhisattvasya pariṇāmabhedāḥ sukhādayo 'pyacetanāḥ / puruṣastu sukhādyananuṣaṅgī
GSP31tattvmiu:15_9: cetanaḥ / so 'yaṃ buddhitattvavarttinā jñānasukhādinā tatpratibimbito buddhisādṛśyaprāptyā
GSP31tattvmiu:15_10: jñānasukhādimāniva bhavati citisādṛśyaprāptyā ca acetanāpi buddhistadavadhyavasāyaśca
GSP31tattvmiu:15_11: cetana iva bhavati / cārvākāstu pratyakṣānyat na mānamiti vadanti / tanmate saṃdigdhaviparyayastu
GSP31tattvmiu:15_12: puruṣabodhanaṃ nopapadyeta / nahi puruṣāntaragataḥ saṃśayaḥ anumānaṃ kathanaṃ vinā vā jñātuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:16_0: pramāṇāntarāṇi tvatraivāntarbhavanti / tathāhi upamānaṃ tāvat gosadṛśo gavaya iti
GSP31tattvmiu:16_1: vākyaṃ tajjanito bodho śabda evāntarbhavati cakṣuḥsaṃnikṛṣṭasya gavayasya yat gosādṛśyajñānaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:16_4: yadā tvavyāpakaḥ sannekatrāsti tadānyatra nāsti yadaikatra nāsti tadānyatrāstīti
GSP31tattvmiu:16_5: vyāptigrahāt / evamiha vaṭe yakṣaḥ prativasati iti aitihyaṃ na pramāṇamanirdiṣṭasvavaktṛkatvena
GSP31tattvmiu:16_6: sandehāt / āptoktatvaniścaye tvāgama eva / evamabhāvo nānupalabdhigamyaḥ kintu pratyakṣa
GSP31tattvmiu:16_7: eva / na hi bhūtalasya kaivalyalakṣaṇātpariṇāmaviśeṣādanyo ghaṭābhāvo nāma / sarva
GSP31tattvmiu:16_8: eva hi bhāvāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ pariṇāminaḥ sa ca pariṇāmabheda aindriyaka evetyalam /
GSP31tattvmiu:17_0: tatra sūkṣmasyāvyaktasyāpratyakṣatve 'pi mahadādikāryeṇa tadanumīyate / tathāhi sadeva
GSP31tattvmiu:17_1: kāryaṃ kāraṇavyāpārātprāgapi / asato hi sattvaṃ duṣkaram nahi nīlaṃ śilpisahasreṇāpi
GSP31tattvmiu:17_2: pītaṃ śakyaṃ kartum / kintu tileṣu pīḍanena tailasyeva āvirbhāvamātramutpattiḥ tirobhāva
GSP31tattvmiu:17_3: eva vināśaḥ / kiñcāsambaddhasyāpi kāryasya janyatve sambaddhatvāviśeṣātsarvaṃ kāryaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:17_4: sarvasmādbhavediti kāryasambaddhasyaiva kāraṇasya janakatvamupeyam / na ca sadasatoḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:17_5: sambandho 'stīti satkāryam / kiñca tantudharmatvāttantūpādeyatvācca na paṭasyārthāntaratvam
GSP31tattvmiu:17_6: yannaivaṃ tannaivaṃ yathā ghaṭapaṭau / tathā arthāntarayoḥ saṃyogo vā bhavati yathā
GSP31tattvmiu:17_7: kuṃḍabadarayoḥ aprāptirvā bhavati himavadvindhyayoḥ / tasmādyathā kūrmaśarīre kūrmāṅgāni
GSP31tattvmiu:17_8: niviśamānāni tirobhavanti na tatra tānyutpadyante na vinaśyanti vā evamekasmātsuvarṇādermukuṭādiprādurbhāva
GSP31tattvmiu:17_9: evotpattiḥ / evañca mahadādikāryaṃ pradhāne 'bhiniviśate avyaktaṃ bhavati iti / kāraṇe
GSP31tattvmiu:17_10: sattyeva kāryasya vibhāgāvibhāgābhyāmavyaktaṃ kāraṇamastīti gamyate / taccāvyaktaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:17_11: nityaṃ vyāpakaṃ ca sarvaṃ kāryaṃ vyāpnoti tathā niḥkriyaṃ kvacidapyanāśritañca evaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:17_12: niravayavaṃ svatantraṃ ca / etadviparītantu vyaktam / evaṃ vyaktamavyaktaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhamoharūpaguṇatrayānvitamacetanaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:17_13: prasavadharmi ca tadviparītaḥ puruṣaḥ sukhādayaśca guṇāḥ sattvarajastamorūpāḥ / sattvasya
GSP31tattvmiu:17_14: prayojanaṃ tu prakāśaḥ rajastu tasya pravartakaṃ tamastu niyāmakaṃ yadi hi tamasā
GSP31tattvmiu:17_15: guruṇā niyamyeta tadā rajaḥ laghu sattvaṃ sarvatra pravarttayet / yathā sattvaṃ rajastamasī
GSP31tattvmiu:17_16: abhibhūya śāntā vṛttimadhigacchati yathā ca rajaḥ sattvarajasī abhibhūya ghorāṃ tathā
GSP31tattvmiu:17_17: tamaḥ sattvarajasī abhibhūya mūḍhāmiti / yadyapyete parasparaṃ virodhaśīlāḥ tathāpi
GSP31tattvmiu:17_19: 'pi / evaṃ sukhahetutvātsattvaṃ sukhātmakaṃ duḥkhahetutvādduḥkhātmakaṃ rajaḥ yanmohakaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:17_20: tattamaḥ / te ca sukhaduḥkhamohāḥ parasparavirodhinaḥ svānurūpāṇyeva parasparaṃ viruddhāni
GSP31tattvmiu:17_21: sukhaduḥkhamohātmakāni nimittāni kalpayanti / tathāhi ekaiva strī svāminaṃ prati
GSP31tattvmiu:17_22: sukharūpasadbhāvāttaṃ sukhākaroti sapatnīstu duḥkhākaroti evamatrāpyekasyāpi nimittabhedādbhedaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:17_24: tu pariṇāmasvabhāvā guṇāḥ kṣaṇamapyapariṇamayya na tiṣṭhantīti sattvaṃ sattvarūpatayā
GSP31tattvmiu:17_25: rajo rajorūpatayā tamastamorūpatayā pravarttate / yathāhi ghanavimuktajalānāṃ jambīrakaravīranārikerādyāśrayabhedādasti
GSP31tattvmiu:17_26: bhedaḥ evamekarūpāṇāmapi guṇānāṃ pratiguṇāśrayaviśeṣādanekarūpatā / ātmā tu vyaktāvyaktasaṃghātabhinnaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:17_27: parārtho hi saṃghāto bhavati / yathā śayanāsanādayaḥ saṃghātāḥ śarīrārthā dṛṣṭāḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:17_28: kiñca yathā rathādi yaṃtryādinādhiṣṭhitaṃ evaṃ triguṇātmakamapi pareṇa kenacidadhiṣṭhīyamānaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:17_29: yuktam / sa cātmā pratiśarīraṃ bhinnaḥ na hyekasmin sukhini sarve sukhinaḥ / sa cāyaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:17_30: puruṣaḥ sākṣī ca bhavati prakṛtirhi svaviṣayacaritaṃ puruṣāya pradarśayati / tathāhi
GSP31tattvmiu:17_31: loke arthipratyarthinau vivādaviṣayaṃ sākṣiṇe darśayataḥ / evaṃ cāyaṃ draṣṭāpi bhavati /
GSP31tattvmiu:17_32: tathā atraiguṇādasya kaivalyaṃ ca dharmaḥ / ātyantiko hi duḥkhatrayābhāvaḥ kaivalyam /
GSP31tattvmiu:17_33: ata evātriguṇatvānmadhyastho 'pi bhavati sukhī hi sukhe tṛpyan duḥkhī dviṣan madhyastho
GSP31tattvmiu:17_34: na bhavati / āta evobhayarāhityādudāsīna ityucyate / evamaprasavadharmitādakartā
GSP31tattvmiu:17_35: 'pi / yadyapi cetano 'haṃ karomīti kṛticaitanyayoraikādhikaraṇyaṃ pratīyate tathāpi
GSP31tattvmiu:17_37: bhogyaṃ hi pradhānaṃ bhoktāramantareṇa na saṃbhavati iti bhavati tasya bhoktrapekṣā
GSP31tattvmiu:17_38: puruṣastu bhogyena pradhānena saṃyuktastadgataṃ duḥkhamātmanyabhimanyamānaḥ kaivalyaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:17_39: prārthayate / tacca sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātinibandhanam na ca sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātiḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:17_40: pradhānamantareṇeti kaivalyārthaṃ puruṣaḥ pradhānamapekṣata iti tayoḥ saṃyogaḥ ata
GSP31tattvmiu:17_41: eva saṃyogo na mahadādisargamantareṇa bhogāya kaivalyāya ca paryāpta iti saṃyoga
GSP31tattvmiu:18_0: atha vivekajñānopayoginī buddhirnirūpyate / tasyāśca vyāpāro 'dhyavasāyaḥ tadabhinnaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:18_1: eṣa buddherlakṣaṇaṃ samānāsamānajātīyavyavacchedakatvāt / tathāhi sarvo 'pi vyavahartā
GSP31tattvmiu:18_2: 'hamatrādhikṛta iti abhimatya mayā etatkartavyamiti adhyavasyati tataśca pravartate /
GSP31tattvmiu:18_3: tatra citisannidhānādāpannacaitanyāyā buddheryo 'yaṃ kartavyamiti viniśayayaḥ so
GSP31tattvmiu:18_5: vairāgyaṃ rāgābhāvaḥ / evamaiśvaryamapi buddhidharmo yato 'ṇimādiprādurbhāvaḥ / ahamatra
GSP31tattvmiu:18_6: śaktaḥ matto nānyo 'trādhikṛtaḥ ato 'hamasmi ityādiko yo 'bhimānaḥ so 'haṅkāravyāpāratvādahaṅkāraḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:18_7: tamupajīvya hi buddhiradhyavasyati karttavyametanmayeti ahaṅkārācca dvividhaḥ sargaḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:18_11: mana ubhayātmakaṃ buddhīndriyaṃ karmendriyañca / cakṣurādīnāṃ ca manodhiṣṭhitānāṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:18_13: sāmānyato jñānamutpadyate / paścācca vastudhamairjātyādibhiryo 'dhyavasāyaḥ sa saṅkalpākhyo
GSP31tattvmiu:18_14: manaso vyāpāraḥ / ekasmādahaṅkārādekādaśavidhāni indriyāṇi bhavantītyatra tu śabdādyupabhogasampravartakādṛṣṭabheda
GSP31tattvmiu:18_15: eva niyāmakaḥ / adṛṣṭabhedastu guṇapariṇāma eva / pañcabuddhīndriyāṇāṃ sambaddhavastvālocanaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:18_16: vṛttiḥ vāgādikarmendriyāṇāṃ tu vacanādayo vṛttayaḥ / evaṃ mahato 'dhyavasāyaḥ ahaṅkārasyābhimānaḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:18_17: saṅkalpo manaso vṛttirvyāpāraḥ / kāryakaraṇābhimukhānāṃ karaṇānāṃ vṛttisaṅkarastu
GSP31tattvmiu:18_18: na bhavati / yathāhi parāvaskandāya pravṛttāḥ śāktīkayāṣṭīkādayaḥ svaṃ svaṃ śaktyādikamevādadate
GSP31tattvmiu:18_19: na parasparayaṣṭyādikam / nanu yāṣṭīkānāṃ cetanatvādastu tathā pravṛttiḥ karaṇānāṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:18_21: iti cenna tatpravṛttau puruṣārthasya hetutvāt etaccopapādayiṣyati / karaṇāni tu trayodaśa /
GSP31tattvmiu:18_22: karaṇatvaṃ tu śabdasparśādiprakāśanaṃ karmendriyāṇāṃ tu vacanādivyāpāraḥ / etadbāhyakaraṇaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:18_23: varttamānakālamantaṣkaraṇaṃ tu trikālam / nadīpūrabhedādabhūdvṛṣṭiḥ asti dhūmādihāgniḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:18_24: pipīlikāṇḍasaṃcaraṇādbhaviṣyati vṛṣṭiriti pratyayāt / ye tu vaiśeṣikāḥ kālamekamatiriktaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:18_27: eṣāṃ cendriyāṇāma pradhānāpradhānabhāvo 'pyasti / yathāhi grāmādhyakṣā karṣakādibhyaḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:18_28: karamādāya viṣayādhyakṣāya prayacchanti viṣayādhyakṣaśca sarvādhyakṣāya sa ca bhūpataye
GSP31tattvmiu:18_29: evaṃ bāhyendriyāṇyālocya manase samarpayanti manaśca saṅkalpyāhaṅkārāya ahaṅkāraścābhimatya
GSP31tattvmiu:18_30: buddhau sarvādhyakṣāyāmiti / ete ca buddhīndriyamanohaṅkārā guṇaviśeṣā guṇānāṃ sattvarajastamasāṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:18_31: vikārāḥ parasparaṃ viruddhāṃ api puruṣārthenaikavākyatāpannāḥ yathā santamasāpanayanena
GSP31tattvmiu:18_32: prakāśāya militā vartitailavahnayaḥ pradīpo bhavati / nanu kasmādbuddhau prayacchanti
GSP31tattvmiu:18_33: na punarahaṅkārāya manase veti cenna puruṣārthasya prayojakatayā sākṣātsādhanaṃ pradhānaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:18_34: buddhireva ahaṅkārādayastu taṃ prati gauṇāḥ / asmadādibhiḥ parasparavyāvṛttāni nānubhūyante
GSP31tattvmiu:18_35: iti śabdāditanmātrāṇi aviśeṣāḥ sūkṣmāṇi ca / ākāśādiṣu tu sthūleṣu kvacitsattvapradhānatayā
GSP31tattvmiu:18_36: śāntāḥ sukhāḥ prasannā laghavaḥ kecidrajastamaḥpradhānatayā ghorā mūḍhāśca / te viśeṣāḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:18_37: punaḥ tridhā sūkṣmaṃ śarīraṃ mātāpitṛjaṃ mahābhūtāni ca / pradhānenādisarge pratipuruṣamekaikamutpāditaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:18_40: iti sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ ṣāṭkauśikamāśrayati / lomalohitamāṃsāni mātṛtaḥ snāyvasthimajjānaḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:18_41: pitṛta iti ṣaṭ kośāḥ / nanu dharmādharmanimittaḥ saṃsāraḥ tasya ca sūkṣmaśarīre 'bhāvātkathaṃ
GSP31tattvmiu:18_42: sthūlaśarīrāśrayaṇamiti cet na dharmādyanvitabuddhyā saṃyogena tasyāpi dharmādyabhivāsitatvāt
GSP31tattvmiu:18_44: ca sthūlaśarīragrahaṇaṃ tayoḥ saṃsargeṇa sūkṣmaśarīraṃ sthūlaśarīramāśritya devo
GSP31tattvmiu:18_45: vā manuṣyo vā paśurvā bhavati / yathāhi naṭastāṃ bhūmikāma vidhāya dharmarājo vā
GSP31tattvmiu:18_46: bhavati vatsarājo vā bhavati iti / hetustvatra puruṣārtha eva / tatrordhvagamanasya
GSP31tattvmiu:18_47: nimittaṃ dharmaḥ / evamadharmeṇādhogatiḥ / jñānena mokṣo 'jñānena bandhaḥ / tattvānabhijñasya
GSP31tattvmiu:18_49: aiśvaryādicchāyā avighātaḥ vighātaścānaiśvaryāt / ayaṃ buddhisargaḥ caturdhā viparyayāśaktituṣṭisiddhibhedāt /
GSP31tattvmiu:18_52: tamaḥ / devādīnāmaṇidādyaiśvaryeṣu śāśvatikatvābhimāno 'smitā mohaḥ / śabdādiṣu viṣayeṣu
GSP31tattvmiu:18_55: ādhyātmikā bāhyāśca prakṛtivyatirikta ātmāstīti niścitya saṃnyāsādeva tavāpavarto
GSP31tattvmiu:18_56: bhaviṣyatīti upadeśādau yā tuṣṭayastā ādhyātmikyaḥ pañcaviṣayoparamāt yā tuṣṭayastā
GSP31tattvmiu:18_57: bāhyāḥ / ātmavidyānāmadhyayanamananādayaḥ siddhibhedāḥ / evaṃ nirūpito buddhisargaḥ /
GSP31tattvmiu:18_59: nanu sukhaduḥkhādayaḥ prākṛtā buddhiguṇāḥ kathaṃ cetane bhavantīti cetsatyam puri
GSP31tattvmiu:18_60: liṅge śerate sa puruṣaḥ / evaṃ ca liṅgapuruṣayoḥ sambandhālliṅgadharmānātmanyadhyavasyati / ayaṃ ca mahadādi
GSP31tattvmiu:19_0: pṛthivyādimahābhūtāntaḥ sargaḥ prakṛtyaiva kṛtaḥ / niṣkāraṇatve tu sadaiva syānnaiva
GSP31tattvmiu:19_1: vā syāt / īśvarastu na tatropādānaṃ citiśakterapariṇāmāt / nāpi īśvarādhiṣṭhitāyā
GSP31tattvmiu:19_3: nanu prakṛteḥ kartṛtve tasyā nityatvenānuparamātkadāpi mokṣo na syāditi cenna / yathā
GSP31tattvmiu:19_4: hi odanakāmaḥ pakvaudano na pravartate punastatra evaṃ yaṃ yaṃ puruṣaṃ prakṛtirmocitavatī
GSP31tattvmiu:19_5: na taṃ prati punaḥ pravartate / nanvacetanāyāṃ prakṛtau kathaṃ cetanadharmaḥ pravṛttiḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:19_7: tasmādasti sarvārthadarśī prakṛteradhiṣṭhātā sa ceśvara eveti cetsatyam yathāhi vatvavivṛddhyarthamacetanamapi
GSP31tattvmiu:19_8: kṣīraṃ pravartate tathā prakṛtirapi puruṣamokṣāya pravartiṣyate / na ceśvarādhiṣṭhānatvena
GSP31tattvmiu:19_9: kṣīre pravṛttiḥ śaṅkayā / dvidhā hi pravṛttirbhavati svārthāya kāruṇyāya vā / na
GSP31tattvmiu:19_10: cāptasakalakāmasyeśvarasya kimapi prārthanīyamasti sargātprāk duḥkhābhāvena karuṇāyā
GSP31tattvmiu:19_11: asaṃbhavāt / kiñca karuṇayā prerita īśvaraḥ sukhina eva sarvān prāṇinaḥ sṛjet na
GSP31tattvmiu:19_12: vicitrān / prakṛtestvacetanatayā nedaṃ dvayaṃ kintu parārthaiva pravṛttiḥ yathā pāriṣadānpradarśayannivartate
GSP31tattvmiu:19_13: naṭaḥ evaṃ prakṛtiḥ ātmānaṃ śabdādyātmanā puruṣādbhedena prakāśya nivartate /
GSP31tattvmiu:20_0: phalābhāve 'pi nirguṇe upakāriṇyapi puruṣe prakṛtistapasvinī pravartate eva yathāhi
GSP31tattvmiu:20_1: guṇavānupakāryapi bhṛtyo nirguṇe upakāriṇyapi svāmini niṣphalārādhanaḥ / yadyapi
GSP31tattvmiu:20_2: nāṭyānnivṛtto 'pi naṭaḥ kālāntare punarapi pravartate evaṃ muktaṃ prati prakṛtistu
GSP31tattvmiu:20_3: na punaḥ pravartate yathāhi vigalitavasanā kulavadhūḥ kadācitkenaciddṛṣṭā cettadāsau
GSP31tattvmiu:20_4: tathā yatate yathā na puruṣāntarāṇi paśyanti evaṃ prakṛtirapi vivekena sākṣātkṛtā
GSP31tattvmiu:20_5: 'tilajjāvaśātpunaḥ svātmānaṃ na pradarśayati / nanu savāsanakleśakarmāśayānāṃ bandhanasaṃjñitānāmapyapariṇāmini
GSP31tattvmiu:20_6: puruṣe 'sambhavātkathaṃ mokṣaḥ mucerbandhanaviśleṣārthatvāt / ata eva na saṃsāro
GSP31tattvmiu:20_7: 'pi sambhavati niṣkriyatvāt / maivam / yathāhi bhṛtyagatau jayaparājayau svāminyupacaryete
GSP31tattvmiu:20_9: saptabhirbhāvairbadhnāti tattvajñānena tu mocayati / evaṃ ca kṛtādasmāttattvābhyāsānnāsmi
GSP31tattvmiu:20_10: na me nāhamiti śuddhamutpadyate jñānaṃ yadviṣayo abhyāsastaṃ sākṣātkārayatīti / nāsmītyanena
GSP31tattvmiu:20_11: kriyāmātranniṣidhyate asteḥ kriyārthatvāt / nāhamityanena kartṛtvaṃ na me ityanena
GSP31tattvmiu:20_12: svāmitvaṃ niṣidhyate / bhogavivekasākṣātkārau prakṛteḥ prasotavyau tau ca prasūtāviti
GSP31tattvmiu:20_13: nivṛttā prakṛtistāṃ niṣkriyaḥ svacchapuruṣaḥ paśyati prakṛtipuruṣayorasaṃsarge 'pyavivekakhyātinibandhanaḥ
GSP31tattvmiu:20_14: saṃsāraḥ punarna bhavati iti / ante tattvajñānasya tadānīmeva śarīrapātastu na bhavati /
GSP31tattvmiu:20_15: yathāhi nivṛtte kulālavyāpāre saṃskāravaśāt cakraṃ bhramattiṣṭhati evaṃ saṃskāravaśāt
GSP31tattvmiu:20_16: śarīramapi śarīrapātānantaraṃ tu pradhānasya nivṛttatvādātyantikamapi duḥkhaṃ naśyati
